system.description: This implant consists of an upgraded, specialized OmniComp and dedicated enhanced synaptic neural processors for computing. A discreet neural jack line feed allows the character to connect to any computer directly. The Hacking Module grants a flat DM+1 to the character’s Computer skill and allows remote hacking of unprotected electronics at up to 3m. Note that at TL9+, most personal electronics cannot be remotely hacked. The Hacking module is illegal on worlds with Law Levels 4+.
system.shortdescr: Grants DM+1 to the character’s Computer skill and allows remote hacking of electronics at a distance of up to 3m
